issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: storm-core
components.description: Core storm daemons and APIs including trident

fields.description:
On a cluster with one supervisor it work.
Even it have more than one worker.
But when I had more than one supervisor it don't work when I have more than one worker.

I have port set for the worker and they are not used.

Worker log look like this:

fields.summary: NETTY DRPC cluster: When the number of worker if higher than 1 with more than one supervisor, the topology fail to execute

comments.body:
The problem was related to IPV6, in the storm.yaml i now use the the name of the machine and not the ip address it have fix some error in the log.

The other problem in the storm.yaml I declare the DRCP server but in the java code I was adding it as well but with less server so the yaml was overwrited when deploy the topology.
